item.title: Phyllis add a quote by Lewis Carroll
Phyllis add a quote by Leopold von Sacher-Masoch
item.description: "You have corrupted my imagination and inflamed my blood..." -- Leopold von Sacher-Masoch

item.title: Phyllis add a quote by Leopold von Sacher-Masoch
item.description: "Man is the one who desires, woman the one who is desired. This is woman's entire but decisive advantage." -- Leopold von Sacher-Masoch

item.title: Phyllis add a quote by S.E. Hinton
item.description: "Stay gold, Ponyboy, stay gold." -- S.E. Hinton

item.title: Phyllis add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "None of us really changes over time. We only become more fully what we are." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Phyllis add a quote by Zadie Smith
item.description: "The past is always tense, the future perfect." -- Zadie Smith

item.title: Phyllis add a quote by Anne Perry
item.description: "The men who cannot laugh at themselves frighten me even more than those who laugh at everything." -- Anne Perry

item.title: Phyllis add a quote by Kelly Moran
item.description: "The first sign that Karma was now in cahoots with the Devil Incarnate to ruin her existance should've been before sunrise and pre-coffee." -- Kelly Moran

item.title: Phyllis add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I hope that in this year to come, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes...you're Doing Something." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Phyllis add a quote by Jerry Garcia
item.description: "What a long strange trip it's been." -- Jerry Garcia
